archiefmat.titel: Admiralty miscellanea. Intercepted mails and papers

archiefmat.notes: Information based on a preliminary inventory drawn up by Dr. Roelof van Gelder and published on the Koninklijke Bibliotheek (KB) website, The Hague, project 'Sailing Letters' (2007). The database has been transferred to the Nationaal Archief (NA) website. See indexen.
